title: [Bug]: Latest Update Causes Hang at StartUp (Reversion)
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

On startup Teams Starts immediately with respecting the delay, bnot miminimised

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

2.0.11

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1.Start up
2.
3.
...
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

flatpak run com.github.IsmaelMartinez.teams_for_linux --minimized
